column1: Rowlie Appledore was a Men of Bree of Bree and member of the Appledore Family.
Rowlie was killed during the in early January
column3: fighting Bill Ferny and Sharkeys ruffians.

column2: from hrod "fame" + land.An Introduction to Elvish
column3: Giving of Names Appledore is an old word for "apple tree".
